revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_SwapTeleFog}} '''A_SetTeleFog''' (''no parameters'')
Switches the calling actor's {{c|{{Property|TeleFogSourceType}}}} and {{c|{{Property|TeleFogDestType}}}}.
This function does nothing if the source and destination fogs are the same. ==Examples== {{noexamples}}
{{DEFAULTSORT:SwapTeleFog}}[[category:Decorate Status change functions]]
